'Springer' is the 2003 debut EP by the Danish group Efterklang. They self-
released it on their Rumraket label in 2003, employing the do-it-yourself
aesthetic by making 500 copies packaged in fake white fur. It was later released
worldwide by The Leaf Label in April 2005.
